item.title: TonRunner
item.description:
TonRunner

This is my scrapbook of all things that interest, amuse, fascinate and inspire me in the world of swimming, cycling and running. I could have done it on facebook but all my friends and family are probably sick to death of my constant witterings and ramblings.

item.title: IF - Rudyard Kipling
item.description:
IF - Rudyard Kipling

Recitation by Sir Michael Caine

item.title: If - Rudyard Kipling - Spoken By Tim Stiffler - Dean by anotherguy
item.description:
If - Rudyard Kipling - Spoken By Tim Stiffler - Dean by anotherguy

I needed some inspiration, so I found this poem and recorded this for myself. Hope you all find some inspiration in it as well.

item.title: How To Burn Fat While Running
item.description:
How To Burn Fat While Running

Who are you? I mean, what kind of runner are you? Are you usually looking forward to a run and enjoying the movement while out on the road? Or are you glad to hit the shower afterwards, with the feeling of having done your body some good?

item.title: [Run Tip#2]
item.description:
[Run Tip#2]

Five 'big' steps to make you a better runner; nobody said it was going to be easy, but if you if you can go some way to achieve these steps you become a stronger runner and running will become more enjoyable. As with every change start with little steps and grow into the habit.

item.title: My 100th parkrun
item.description:
My 100th parkrun

This was a post that I wrote on Tonbridge parkrun's Facebook account; for my future reference (when an email complaining about us not scanning and barcode on a phone comes in) I have made a copy here.

item.title: DreamRide
item.description:
DreamRide

Enter a dream world where the trails never end. Where the promise of joy and freedom exist around each bend. Take a magical trip through beautiful landscapes and join us on this DreamRide. DreamRide was filmed in Utah, Nevada, California, Oregon, and Washington in the Fall of 2015.

item.title: parkrun #118
item.description:
parkrun #118

The apricot T-shirt gets a run out in the sun for the first time.

item.title: Standard Distance:1900m swim, 40km Ride, 10km Bike
item.description:
Standard Distance:1900m swim, 40km Ride, 10km Bike

A beautiful but challenging course for my first standard distance triathlon. Posted a 2hr32min time which put me in 64th position out of about 800 so happy with that.

item.title: LOL! Barefoot running just the sort of mental thing we wanted, say fitness freaks
item.description:
LOL! Barefoot running just the sort of mental thing we wanted, say fitness freaks

TRENDY barefoot running is the perfect combination of misery, showing off and pain, according to exercise fanatics. Running without footwear supposedly improves performance, although the key benefits to fitness obsessives are proving how hard they are and making people stare at them.
